component.name: Kanji Dojo
component.summary: A multi-platform application for memorizing Japanese language

description.p: Practice writing Japanese letters, learn their meanings and related words Features: Memorize how to write and read kana and kanji Follow JLPT levels or school grades Create your own decks to study, more than 6000 characters in total are available Use SRS reviewing system to avoid forgetting learned information Search letters and words with built-in dictionary Study words with flashcards Available modes to write words and pick correct letter readings Works offline
